title: 04/02/2021 - HOUR 1 - Shanahan's Challenge, Tim Miles, Patriot Moves
itunes:title: 04/02/2021 - HOUR 1 - Shanahan's Challenge, Tim Miles, Patriot Moves
description:
In this hour of The Herd with Colin Cowherd, Doug Gottlieb--in for Colin--explains San Francisco head coach Kyle Shanahan's greatest challenge yet. Also, former head coach and current college basketball analyst for FOX Sports, Tim Miles chats with Doug about the retirement of North Carolina head coach Roy Williams, Gonzaga's unstoppable run and more. Finally, are the New England Patriots ready to make another big move?

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
